title: Narrative-Based Advanced Learning of Natural Science Concepts: Mobile Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic natural science concepts and possession of professional practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, verification of concept application skills through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Explain strategies for improving low-prior-knowledge peers' comprehension by analyzing science concepts containing narratives
Systematically reconstruct advanced scientific theories using historical context-based narrative pretexts (pretexts)
Learners can design scientifically grounded solutions applicable to real-world work problems using narrative-based learning materials in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
